entity.neapolitan.banana_peel.descriptio: Fool me once, don't fool me twice!
entity.neapolitan.bananarrow.description: A highly dangerous, downright volatile projectile. Use with the utmost level of care.
entity.neapolitan.plantain_spider.descri: A jungle-native spider which has limbs that inflict slipping upon contact.

item.neapolitan.chimpanzee_banner_patter: A face that'd make you go bananas.
item.neapolitan.chocolate_bar.descriptio: A sweetly rich, milk and cacao treat! May be used in all sorts of treats! Causes sugar rushes.
item.neapolitan.chocolate_ice_cream.desc: A rich, milky dessert which causes sugar rushes.
item.neapolitan.chocolate_milkshake.desc: Doesn't grant any effects, but is still a wonderful concoction of milk and rich cacao.
item.neapolitan.chocolate_spider_eye.des: The spider eye works oddly well in supplementing a sugary boost..
item.neapolitan.cooked_mint_chops.descri: Cooked fresh, it smells like the air is proud of you.
item.neapolitan.dried_banana.description: Could be called plantains if a different species, these are a good snack in a go.
item.neapolitan.dried_vanilla_pods.descr: It's toxins have been drained, making for a pleasant, well-rounded scent.
item.neapolitan.ice_cubes.description: Dropped from mining ice! Can be used in the making of ice cream- It's quite 'cronchy'.
item.neapolitan.milk_bottle.description: The best thing since milk buckets! Can be consumed to remove status effects.
item.neapolitan.mint_candies.description: Incredibly sweet, freshens up your mouth!
item.neapolitan.mint_chocolate.descripti: Sweetly rich and freshness all around, makes you wanna go berserk.
item.neapolitan.mint_chops.description: A fresh take on flavoring meat, the herbal boost makes for a more pleasant mutton.
item.neapolitan.mint_ice_cream.descripti: ??? lore, tag.forge.food.description, tag.diet.sugars.description, tag.salt.can_be_salted.description, tag.diet.proteins.description, tag.toughasnails.thirst.2_thirst_drinks.description, tag.toughasnails.cooling_consumed_items.description, tag.create.upright_on_belt.description, tag.neapolitan.ice_cream.description

item.neapolitan.strawberries.description: Found in plains patches, these uniquely shaped fruit has an oddly hearty flavor.
item.neapolitan.strawberry_banana_smooth: A hearty, slippy smoothie which brings a brisk chill on a scalding day.
A heartier alternative to simple roasted adzuki.
item.neapolitan.strawberry_ice_cream.des: A hearty, yet still distinctly sweet, cream. Still cold!
item.neapolitan.strawberry_milkshake.des: Doesn't give any effects, just a sweet taste.
item.neapolitan.strawberry_scones.descri: A villager delicacy. Sweet, bready, and good for the heart.
